name: Tribe Dash - Stone Age Time Management & Strategy
name_original: Tribe Dash - Stone Age Time Management & Strategy
description:
Experience the life of a tribal leader from the Stone Age! Hunt, collect resources, trade, scare off wild animals, and search for treasure.

Allocate resources
Collect essential resources to clear rubble, defend against tiger attacks, and much more. Trade resources with a merchant at favorable rates and distribute responsibilities among fellow tribesmen.


Explore the area
The game has many exciting levels of varying difficulty. Discover the world of the Stone Age, find food, and defeat enemies as quickly as possible.


Get rewards
Get bonuses for completing levels quickly. Get chests, diamonds, various boosters, and many other rewards when you complete missions!


Take care of the Dinosaur
Feed the cute dinosaur in order to get help and survive in the Stone Age.
